Deferring this to iteration 2.  Need to finish solving problems in Platform.UI.LogView.Part3 and investigate why Vrushali is getting failures in Platform.UI.LogView.Part2 when we do not.

Adding Liz to the cc list as we may need her help.

Ali has investigated the failures in Platform.UI.LogView.Part3 and found they are caused by bugzilla 175398.

This defect will be used to investigate why Vrushali has failures running Platform.UI.LogView.Part2.

I see that one failure in Platform.UI.LogView.Part2 is an assertion failure. Could you run the test manually and verify that the correct number of logs are appearing? This will determine whether it is a defect in the code or not. Also, are you able to run these two test cases in quick mode without failures? (you may need to run the preceeding test cases to set up the tests dependening on how the test case is written).

Hello,

I tried fix for  testsuite Platform.UI.LogView.Part2  using latest build but I am getting same errors as specified in Comment #6 .

Agent Controller: tptpdc.win_ia32-TPTP-4.4.0-200705081514

I tried the testsuite on my desktop and laptop using TPTP200705080100 driver. They are all pass. 
We have several similar bugs (174155, 174150) that AGR testsuites can pass on one developer?s machine but fail on the other one's machine. I don't think it is the testsuite problem. It is more likely either the AGR problem or the Agent Controller problem. Should we close these bugs and open a new bug to address this problem?
Not stop ship for 4.4 so deferring to future.

I retested using the TPTP-4.4.0-200705080100A on laptop and desktop. It passes on both machine.
